summary: Comprehensive testing of Yiğit'e Vurma Oyunu completed. Backend APIs working well (92.3% success rate), frontend authentication and navigation functional, but character interaction and Socket.IO multiplayer have issues.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 for unauthorized access

ui_bugs.issue: Character clicking has DOM stability issues - element not stable for interaction
ui_bugs.symptoms: Element is not attached to DOM or not stable during click attempts

integration_issues.issue: Socket.IO room creation not transitioning to wait screen
Character clicking fails due to element stability

critical_fixes: Fix character container DOM stability issue preventing game interaction
Debug Socket.IO room creation - rooms not transitioning to wait screen properly
testing_notes: Eye tracking animation or other DOM manipulations may be causing character click instability
Socket.IO connection and event handling needs investigation
Auto-clicker (J key) and combo system testing blocked by character interaction issue
recommendations: Add stable selectors or reduce DOM animations during character interaction
Check Socket.IO server logs for room creation issues
Consider adding loading states for better UX during Socket.IO operations
